title: Track an Inbound Shipment
description: A planner wants to know the current location and ETA of a critical inbound shipment.

tasks.description: Retrieve the tracking number for the shipment from the purchase order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the carrier tracking number associated with the PO.

tasks.description: Use the tracking number to check the status on the carrier's portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the tracking tool to find the shipment is currently 'In Transit' and 1 day away.

tasks.description: Update the internal record with the latest ETA.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the expected delivery date in the ERP system.
